content.question: Which of the following could be an expression for <math alttext="f open parentheses x close parentheses"> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>f</mi> <mfenced> <mi>x</mi> </mfenced> </mrow> <annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation> </semantics> </math> ?

choices.label: ​<math alttext="3 cos open parentheses 2 open parentheses x minus pi over 4 close parentheses close parentheses minus 1"><semantics><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi>cos</mi><mfenced><mrow><mn>2</mn><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>-</mo><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>4</mn></mfrac></mrow></mfenced></mrow></mfenced><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​<math alttext="3 cos open parentheses 2 open parentheses x minus pi over 8 close parentheses close parentheses minus 1"><semantics><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi>cos</mi><mfenced><mrow><mn>2</mn><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>-</mo><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>8</mn></mfrac></mrow></mfenced></mrow></mfenced><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​<math alttext="3 sin open parentheses 2 open parentheses x minus pi over 4 close parentheses close parentheses minus 1"><semantics><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi>sin</mi><mfenced><mrow><mn>2</mn><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>-</mo><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>4</mn></mfrac></mrow></mfenced></mrow></mfenced><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​<math alttext="3 sin open parentheses 2 open parentheses x minus pi over 8 close parentheses close parentheses minus 1"><semantics><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi>sin</mi><mfenced><mrow><mn>2</mn><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>-</mo><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>8</mn></mfrac></mrow></mfenced></mrow></mfenced><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

content.answer: ​<math alttext="3 sin open parentheses 2 open parentheses x minus pi over 4 close parentheses close parentheses minus 1"><semantics><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi>sin</mi><mfenced><mrow><mn>2</mn><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>-</mo><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>4</mn></mfrac></mrow></mfenced></mrow></mfenced><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>
